channel.title: K-Pop News on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in K-Pop News on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How K-pop Stars Tomorrow X Together Are Evolving With ‘The Star Chapter: Together’
item.description: The five-member boy group returns with their fourth studio album, which closes one chapter and opens another: “The reason why we’re wrapping [this album series] is because we’ve had a lot of growth.”

item.title: How K-pop Stars Tomorrow X Together Are Evolving With ‘The Star Chapter: Together’
item.description: The five-member boy group returns with their fourth studio album, which closes one chapter and opens another: “The reason why we’re wrapping [this album series] is because we’ve had a lot of growth.”

item.title: ‘Squid Game’ Stars Byung Hun Lee and Yim Siwan to Make KCON L.A. 2025 Appearances
item.description: The annual K-pop festival features daytime panel and pop-up programming, along with three nights of all-star performances featuring HxW, NCT 127, Aespa, Monsta X, Key, IVE and more.

item.title: ‘Squid Game’ Stars Byung Hun Lee and Yim Siwan to Make KCON L.A. 2025 Appearances
item.description: The annual K-pop festival features daytime panel and pop-up programming, along with three nights of all-star performances featuring HxW, NCT 127, Aespa, Monsta X, Key, IVE and more.

item.title: K-pop Stars BTS Release First Live Album ‘Permission To Dance On Stage’ (Exclusive Photo)
item.description: All seven members of the supergroup recently completed their mandatory military service and the band is expected to release a new album and tour next year.

item.title: K-pop Stars BTS Release First Live Album ‘Permission To Dance On Stage’ (Exclusive Photo)
item.description: All seven members of the supergroup recently completed their mandatory military service and the band is expected to release a new album and tour next year.

item.title: KCON L.A. Returns — How to Secure the Best Ticket Deals (and Stream the Festival Online for Free)
item.description: The world’s no. 1 K-pop festival is back in Los Angeles after kicking of its 2025 season in Chiba for KCON Japan.

item.title: KCON L.A. Returns — How to Secure the Best Ticket Deals (and Stream the Festival Online for Free)
item.description: The world’s no. 1 K-pop festival is back in Los Angeles after kicking of its 2025 season in Chiba for KCON Japan.

item.title: K-pop Group Riize Announces Venues and Ticketing Details for North American Tour Leg (Exclusive)
item.description: The K-pop boy group is heading to eight cities across North America this fall for the Riizing Loud tour.

item.title: K-pop Group Riize Announces Venues and Ticketing Details for North American Tour Leg (Exclusive)
item.description: The K-pop boy group is heading to eight cities across North America this fall for the Riizing Loud tour.

item.title: Amazon Music to Exclusively Stream KCON L.A. 2025
item.description: The annual K-pop festival features daytime panel and pop-up programming at the L.A. Convention Center, along with three nights of all-star performances at the Crypto.com Arena.
